<br>

### Get ready

Please download and install:

<a href="https://cran.r-project.org/"><b>R</b></a><br>
<a href="https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download"><b>RStudio</b></a>

Then run in RStudio's console window (run = copy & paste into the window and press ENTER):

`install.packages('mousetrap')`

If you encounter any problems please <a href="mailto:dirk.wulff@gmail.com">email</a> me.
